episode_event_pasiosalon_date_ch0257_00_: Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Are you back from training?
You’re so on top of things. I need to train like you.

Ever since I became a member of your team, I’ve 
had the chance to meet many Trainers from
different regions, and I’m happy about that, but...

At the same time, I got to know how big the talent
pool really is.
Now I know why I couldn’t win...
Against Leon, I mean.

Back then—and even today—he’s always looking
ahead to the future.

Even in the first tournament I battled him in, he
was like that.

I’ll become the Champion of Galar, and I won’t
lose to you!
I want to become stronger with everyone in Galar.
That’s why I’m gonna win this battle!

At the time, I was only thinking about becoming
the Champion.

Nessa and Sonia were also competing with us,
and they also only thought of becoming Champion.
But Leon was different.

He had a clear vision of what he wanted to do
after winning.
That’s why he could beat the previous Champion.

Well, now I have a vision of the future—and the
others do, too.

[Name:PlayerNickname ]! After meeting you,
I got the chance to think back on my past self.
So, let me thank you!
Is there anything I can do?
I want you to choose my outfit.
OK, sure thing!
I want to look stylish.
Hmm... I see!
Well, you’re in good hands!

I’ll choose the best outfit for you, so keep
your schedule cleared!

Now then, before I pick your outfit, I want to
know exactly what you’re looking for.
What kind of look do you want?
Casual
Hmm...
Formal
Hmm, I see.
OK, what kind of accessories do you like?
Hats
I thought so! They’re your trademark, right?
Bags
Of course! Those last you a long time!

OK then. I know what you need. My
recommendation is...

Raihan and [Name:PlayerNickname ] enjoyed
shopping for a while.
As I expected, you look great! Let’s take a photo!
Hey, look at you!

Don’t worry. I won’t put this on social media or
anything.

You must have your own idea of when to show
everyone your outfit, right?

I’m happy I got to choose an outfit for someone
other than myself.

I was supposed to be thanking you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], but instead, I was the
one that had fun!
By the way...why did you want a new outfit?
Is it because...
there’s someone you want to show that outfit to?
Hahaha, don’t hide it from me!
You could tell me secretly, you know.
